name: Shinobi Legend TD
description:
Be the best leader of defense!

Filled with Pixel Art, multiple different ninjas to use, and multiple different leaders to defend the village with. Prove that you are the best Shinobi Legend leader! 

Download on Google Play Store or just click on the Google Play App Link down below

You are the leader of the defense and your ninjas need you to guide them. 

Every ninja have two possible elements schools to choose from. And every enemy has an element. With it comes resistances and weaknesses.

As a leader you'll have to know your ninjas well and choose them carefully.
